name: Whiskey Glass
description: A spirits glass, decorated with old-fashioned crisscross patterns. It is dirty, with murky residue along the lip.

name: Playing Cards
description: An ordinary set of black and red playing cards. They appear unused, lacking the typical wear on the edges and tarnishing on the faces.

name: Newspaper
description: An incomplete crossword puzzle spreads across the front page. One of the hints reads: ‘7 down is death’. The writer’s solutions are barely legible, with letters of varying sizes filling each box.

name: Suicide Note
description: A haphazard, frantic farewell. The scribbles are inconsistent but show sophisticated penmanship. The page is littered with cavities along the way, presumably where the unsavory mental state of the writer caused the pen to break through the paper.

name: Dirty Money
description: A frayed stack of cash, acclimated to frequent transportation and changing hands.

name: Whiskey Bottle
description: A tall bottle of spirits, thick and heavy. The label is peeling, and the whiskey is clear and golden.

name: Cigarette Stubs
description: A dark, forest-green pack of toasted cigarettes. It has the words 'LUCKY STRIKE' branded on the front.

name: Cold Soup
description: Soup with beans and rice. A hearty meal for an ordinary person.
